name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: patient_age
description: Patient age, must be 18 years or older

name: patient_bmi
description: Body Mass Index. Eligible if ≥40, or ≥35 with comorbid condition

name: comorbidity_flag
description: Indicates if patient has an obesity-related comorbidity (e.g., diabetes, cardiovascular disease, hypertension, severe sleep apnea, Pickwickian syndrome, obesity-related cardiomyopathy)

name: weight_loss_program_history
description: Indicates past participation in a weight loss program

name: conservative_therapy_attempt
description: Indicates inadequate weight loss despite comprehensive lifestyle interventions (diet, exercise, behavioral modifications)

name: preop_medical_clearance
description: Indicates whether pre-operative medical evaluation and clearance were completed

name: preop_psych_clearance
description: Indicates whether pre-operative mental health evaluation and clearance were completed

name: preop_education_completed
description: Indicates whether pre-operative education about risks, benefits, expectations, long-term follow-up, and behavioral adherence was completed

name: treatment_plan_documented
description: Indicates whether a treatment plan addressing pre- and post-operative needs is documented

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: Covered CPT procedure codes for bariatric surgery (e.g., 43644, 43645, 43770, 43771, 43772, 43773, 43774, 43775, 43842, 43843, 43845, 43846, 43847, 43848, 43886, 43887, 43888) and percutaneous vertebral augmentation/vertebroplasty/kyphoplasty (e.g., 22510, 22511, 22512, 22513, 22514, 22515) when covered by policy

name: procedure_code_ICD10PCS
description: Covered ICD-10 procedure codes for bariatric surgery (e.g., 0DP60CZ, 0DV64ZZ, 0D160ZA, 0DB60ZZ)

name: pva_procedure_type
description: Type of percutaneous vertebral augmentation performed: percutaneous vertebroplasty (PVP) or percutaneous kyphoplasty (PKP)

name: vcf_onset_category
description: Fracture acuity category based on symptom onset: acute (<6 weeks) or subacute (6–12 weeks)

name: vcf_symptom_duration_weeks
description: Number of weeks since symptom onset for vertebral compression fracture

name: vcf_level_range
description: Anatomical levels eligible for treatment (T1–L5) for osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture

name: advanced_imaging_confirmation
description: Advanced imaging confirms acute/subacute osteoporotic VCF (e.g., bone marrow edema on MRI or uptake on bone scan/SPECT/CT)

name: imaging_finding_bone_marrow_edema
description: Bone marrow edema present on MRI at the fracture level

name: imaging_finding_nuclear_uptake
description: Increased uptake at the fracture level on bone scan, SPECT, or CT indicating acuity

name: hospitalized_status
description: Indicates whether the patient is hospitalized at time of evaluation for VCF

name: pain_score_NRS
description: Numeric Rating Scale (0–10) pain score

name: pain_score_VAS
description: Visual Analog Scale (0–10) pain score

name: pain_threshold_hospitalized_NRS_or_VAS
description: Hospitalized patient pain threshold for eligibility (NRS or VAS ≥ 8)

name: pain_threshold_nonhospitalized_NRS_or_VAS
description: Non-hospitalized patient pain threshold for eligibility after optimal non-surgical management (NRS or VAS ≥ 5)

name: optimal_nonsurgical_management_attempted
description: Indicates whether optimal non-surgical management (e.g., analgesics, bracing, activity modification, physical therapy) was attempted

name: pain_worsening_on_nsm
description: Pain worsening despite optimal non-surgical management

name: pain_persistent_ge5_on_nsm
description: Pain stable or improved but persists with NRS or VAS ≥5 after optimal non-surgical management

name: vertebral_height_loss_progression
description: Progression of vertebral body height loss on follow-up

name: vertebral_height_loss_percent
description: Percent vertebral body height reduction; eligibility factor when >25%

name: kyphotic_deformity_present
description: Presence of kyphotic deformity associated with the vertebral compression fracture

name: rdq_score
description: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire score; severe impact defined as RDQ >17

name: bmd_evaluation_referral
description: Referral for bone mineral density evaluation as part of continuum of care for patients with VCF

name: osteoporosis_education_provided
description: Osteoporosis education provided to the patient

name: osteoporosis_prevention_treatment_program_participation
description: Patient instructed to and/or participating in an osteoporosis prevention/treatment program

name: exclusion_pain_not_due_to_identified_vcf
description: Current back pain is not primarily due to the identified acute or subacute VCF(s) (absolute contraindication)

name: exclusion_active_infection
description: Presence of osteomyelitis, discitis, or active systemic/surgical site infection (absolute contraindication)

name: exclusion_pregnancy
description: Pregnancy (absolute contraindication)

name: exclusion_fractures_per_procedure_count
description: Number of vertebral fractures planned per procedure; relative contraindication if greater than three

name: exclusion_bone_cement_or_opacifier_allergy
description: Allergy to bone cement or opacification agents (relative contraindication)

name: exclusion_uncorrected_coagulopathy
description: Uncorrected coagulopathy (relative contraindication)

name: exclusion_spinal_instability
description: Spinal instability (relative contraindication)

name: exclusion_myelopathy_from_fracture
description: Myelopathy resulting from the fracture (relative contraindication)

name: exclusion_neurologic_deficit
description: Presence of neurologic deficit (relative contraindication)

name: exclusion_neural_impingement
description: Neural impingement present (relative contraindication)

name: exclusion_canal_compromise_or_retropulsion
description: Fracture retropulsion/canal compromise (relative contraindication)

name: diagnosis_osteoporotic_vcf
description: Diagnosis of osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture as the target condition for PVA
